page.title: 11A FRESHWATER HOTELIER
page.content:
MRS COOPER, A FRESHWATER HOTELIER
Mrs Cooper runs a hotel. She has got 8 people to help her. There are 13 bedrooms. The hotel has also got a bar. Mrs Cooper told us that the time she does the most business is in the summer. The guests usually have dinner in the dining room unless they are ill then they have it in their rooms. The hotel has 4 waiters. The guests usually book their rooms, but some just come on the off chance. Mrs Cooper has been running the hotel for six years. Before they bought the hotel it was just an ordinary house. The hotel is in the country, not near the road. It has 1 acre of ground. The house was built in 1856. The hotel has three sea horse awards - which shows that it is a very good hotel.
